name: express-extractheaders
description: Express middleware for setting response headers based on <meta http-equiv=... content=...> tags in the response body

scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development istanbul cover _mocha -- --reporter dot && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: Andreas Lind <andreaslindpetersen@gmail.com>
